comments:
in i0513

I had a feature (and project) called "foo".  I exported it a few times and all 
went well.  I then renamed the feature project to "bar" but did not rename the 
feature (forgot).  I tried exporting and got the NPE shown below.  I then 
renamed the feature and tried again.  Same result.  I then restarted the IDE 
and the export worked fine.
